value.name: Joseph Mekhi Knowles, Tanaj Johnson Charged With Attempted Murder In Shooting Of Mario Gabriel Ramirez In Pasadena
value.description: Two men have been charged in the shooting of a 10-year-old boy who was playing in the front yard of his Pasadena home on Valentine's Day.

value.name: Man Arrested In 91 Freeway BB Gun Shooting
value.description: It's not clear if the man arrested is responsible for any of the more than 100 BB or pellet gun shootings on Southern California's freeways. Tina Patel reports.

value.name: Two Men Face Attempted Murder Charges in Valentine's Day Shooting of 10-Year-Old Boy
value.description: Two men have been arrested in connection with the Valentine's Day shooting that wounded a 10-year-old boy who was playing in front of his family's home in Pasadena.

value.name: Carson City woman arrested after carrying indigestion, pancreatic medication without a prescription present
value.description: A 45-year-old Carson City woman was arrested during a traffic stop Thursday afternoon in the area of Roop and Long after allegedly violating her parole after deputies found two medications without a prescription present in her purse,

value.name: Officials: Tiny uptick in 2020 military sex assault reports
value.description: Reports of sexual assaults among the U.S. military increased by a very small amount in 2020, a year when troops were largely locked down for months as bases around the world

value.name: Historic Nevada State Prison tours sold out, more planned at later dates
value.description: Tours this weekend and June 5 for the historic Nevada State Prison in Carson City are now filled and sold out. More tours will be announced at a later date at the website here. *** Be one of the first to go to prison.
